name: Arcade Machine 1991
description:
Arcade Machine 1991 

is a simple retro game.

There are three holes. Your task is to push one of the falling squares into a hole to win the game.    :D 

The square can be controlled with WASD keys or arrow keys.

If your time is up, you lose the game :(

That's it!

Now you are ready to play! Have fun!

:)
